body_html:
@F3PiX the blog posts are posted by Team prodyoGEEKY and as you can see on thir profile page, they are the ones referencing a railsgirlssummerofcode.org blog post. It was not added to the Teams App by the orga team.

  1. the way we pull in blogposts from the orga website.

Yes, that's the reason. See #901 (comment) above: the Atom/RSS URL is automatically extracted in lib/feed.rb. I'm currently adding a quick fix to allow a single web page as a Source that won't be interpreted as a feed.
